bill_title: Honoring the 2021-2022 Canton C-Hawk boys wrestling team for its outstanding accomplishments.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, honoring the 2021-2022 Canton C-Hawk boys wrestling team for its outstanding accomplishments. WHEREAS, the Canton C-Hawk boys wrestling team, led by head coach Jeremy Swenson, has won ten consecutive region titles; and WHEREAS, the C-Hawk wrestling team won its fifth straight Class B individual state tournament title, amassing a team total of 155.5 points; and WHEREAS, Ayson Rice (126 lbs.), Tanner Meyers (195 lbs.), and Marshal Baldwin (220 lbs.) won individual state titles for the C-Hawks, and Kale Ask (126 lbs.) was a second-place finisher: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Seventh Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2021-2022 Canton C-Hawk boys wrestling team be honored for its outstanding accomplishments.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 2021-2022 Canton C-Hawk boys wrestling team for its outstanding accomplishments. WHEREAS, the Canton C-Hawk boys wrestling team, led by head coach Jeremy Swenson, has won ten consecutive region titles; and WHEREAS, the C-Hawk wrestling team won its fifth straight Class B individual state tournament title, amassing a team total of 155.5 points; and WHEREAS, Ayson Rice (126 lbs.), Tanner Meyers (195 lbs.), and Marshal Baldwin (220 lbs.) won individual state titles for the C-Hawks, and Kale Ask (126 lbs.) was a second-place finisher: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Seventh Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2021-2022 Canton C-Hawk boys wrestling team be honored for its outstanding accomplishments.
